thread.title: Calming Down Today; Great Weekend Ahead - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Calming Down Today; Great Weekend Ahead - NewsBreak

author: Christian Boteler
title: Calming Down Today; Great Weekend Ahead - NewsBreak
text:
By Christian Boteler ,
17 hours ago WOAY-TV (Oak Hill, WV): After some loud and strong thunderstorms and showers moved through last night, wet and windy conditions will continue through the morning. A switch from rain to a wintery mix is expected thanks to the cold front that has passed up by, dropping temperatures below freezing this morning. These showers will also bring gusty winds to the region. Conditions will calm down in the afternoon as cloudy skies remain through the day. There will be little to no accumulation with the exception of our high mountains, which will receive an inch or two of snow. This system will be the last active weather we experience for a few days, making for a great weekend ahead. Read full article
Read in NewsBreak 6
